analysis: The project appears to be a website about black holes with existing CSS, HTML, and JavaScript files. The current theme needs to be enhanced with a dark, cosmic aesthetic featuring black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements. The event specifies a focus on animated objects and slides related to black holes, so the improvements should emphasize these aspects.

improvements.description: Enhance the CSS with a dark cosmic theme, including animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements. Add keyframes for animations like rotating black holes and pulsating glows.
Update the HTML to include sections for animated slides and interactive elements related to black holes. Ensure the structure supports the new animations and themes.
Implement JavaScript functions to control the animations and interactions for the black hole theme. Ensure smooth transitions and user-friendly interactions for the animated slides and objects.
